1234/16 = 77 ; 2
77/16 = 4 ; 13
4/16 = 0 ; 4
(1234)_10_ = (4D2)_16_


23/16 = 1 ; 7
1/16 = 0 ; 1
0.77*16 = 12.32
0.32*16 = 5.12
0.12*16 = 1.92
0.92*16 = 14.72
0.72*16 = 11.52
0.52*16 = 8.32
0.32*16
(23.77)_10_ = (17.C51EB8)_16_


256/16 = 16 ; 0
16/16 = 1 ; 0
1/16 = 0 ; 1
(256)_10_ = (100)_16_


7*16+7 = 112+7 = 119
(77)_16_ = (119)_10_


8*16 = 128
(80)_16_ = (128)_10_


6*16+6+1/256 = 96+6+0.00390625 = 102.00390625
(66.01)_16_ = (102.00390625)_10_
